name: Create a new user in a list in Iterable from a new contact in Google Contacts
description:
This template periodically checks for new contacts in Google Contacts and uses the retrieved information to add new uses into a list in Iterable.

The template expects your Iterable list to have at least these fields:
1) email
2) name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking on the clock icon on the first module.
